statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -2 \\ 3 \\ -2 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ 1 \\ -1 \\ -3 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -6 \\ -7 \\ 9 \\ 5 \\ 8 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -2 \\ 0 \\ 0 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 8 \\ 8 \\ -6 \\ 4 \\ 4 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
